item.description:
Hello Coffee Talk,

We will visit the Yale Center for British Art and meet in the lobby at 12:30 pm and visit for approximately 1 hour.

Then stop in into the Atticus Bookstore Cafe for coffee and lunch or dessert.

Atticus is the home/start up of the Chabaso Bakery, also known for it's Black Bean Soup and also my personal favorite, their Cranberry Pecan French Toast which is on their Breakfast Menu.

Please see the details for each venue below and be sure to read each venue's story.

Yale Center for British Art

Admission is Free.

Donations not required but warmly welcomed.

"The Yale Center for British Art is an art museum at Yale University in New Haven, Connecticut which houses the most comprehensive collection of British Art outside the United Kingdom.

It concentrates on work from the Elizabethan period onward." - Wikipedia

http://britishart.yale.edu/

britishart.yale.edu/

 

Atticus Bookstore Cafe

At your own cost

"Atticus is an independent bookstore and cafe, serving New Haven for over 30 years." - Atticus Bookstore Cafe

http://atticusbookstorecafe.com/

atticusbookstorecafe.com/

Cheers,

Swadhi
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby of the Yale Center for British Art at 12:30pm
item.name: Yale Center for British Art & Atticus Bookstore Cafe
